sentences.en: A fire could have been deliberately started to cloak small coordinated troop movements.
sentences.cn: 可能是有人故意放火掩护小规模的部队协同行动。

sentences.en: All of a sudden a tall old man in a black cloak loomed out of the murk.
sentences.cn: 一位身着黑斗篷的高个儿老者突然从暗处闪了出来。

sentences.en: He slipped on a dark cloak and went after her, unseen.
sentences.cn: 他穿上一件黑斗篷,悄悄地跟在她后边.

sentences.en: He uses long words as a cloak for his ignorance.
sentences.cn: 他用冗长的话作为他无知的掩饰.

sentences.en: hills cloaked in mist
sentences.cn: 雾霭笼罩的群山

sentences.en: She is wearing a red cloak with a hood.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一件红色带兜帽的披风.

sentences.en: She threw a heavy woollen cloak over her shoulders.
sentences.cn: 她把一件厚重的羊毛斗篷披在肩上.

sentences.en: She threw off her cloak with an abandoned gesture.
sentences.cn: 她以一种放纵的姿势脱掉了斗篷。

sentences.en: She was released from prison in a cloak and dagger operation yesterday.
sentences.cn: 在昨天的一次秘密行动中她从监狱获释。

sentences.en: Some people use patriotism as a cloak for making money.
sentences.cn: 有的人以爱国为借口赚钱.

sentences.en: The invaders attacked under a cloak of fog.
sentences.cn: 侵略者在大雾的掩护下发动了进攻.

sentences.en: The long cloak she was wearing enveloped her completely.
sentences.cn: 她穿着的斗篷把她全包裹起来了。

sentences.en: The snow covered up the fields with a white cloak.
sentences.cn: 积雪给田野盖上了一件白色的外衣.

sentences.en: The talks have been cloaked in secrecy.
sentences.cn: 会谈是秘密进行的。

sentences.en: Their cloak of neutrality in the Iran - Iraq war was beginning to wear a bit thin.
sentences.cn: 他们在两伊战争中表面上所采取的中立态度开始有点露馅了.

sentences.en: They left under the cloak of darkness.
sentences.cn: 他们在黑暗的掩护下离开了。

sentences.en: They met in classic cloak-and-dagger style beside the lake in St James's Park.
sentences.cn: 他们像经典间谍片里所演的那样，偷偷摸摸地在圣詹姆斯公园的湖边相会。

sentences.en: Today most of England will be under a cloak of thick mist.
sentences.cn: 今天，英格兰大部分地区将被浓雾笼罩。

sentences.en: Today most of New England will be under a cloak of thick mist.
sentences.cn: 今天新英格兰大部分地区会在浓雾的笼罩中。

sentences.en: You wear hector's cloak.
sentences.cn: 偷鸡不着蚀把米.
